mapper.sql: itbr.id, @rowno:=@rowno+1 AS sequence, itbr.item_no,item.`item_name`,item.`item_desc`, itbr.`use_number`, (IFNULL(itbr.use_number,0)-IFNULL(SUM( CASE sa.sfc WHEN #{sfc} THEN sa.use_num ELSE 0 END ),0)) surplus_number
mapper.select:
select
FROM ly_item_bom_relation itbr LEFT JOIN ly_item item ON itbr.`item_no` = item.`item_no` LEFT JOIN (SELECT @rowno:=0) r ON 1=1 LEFT JOIN ly_sfc_assembly sa ON sa.item = itbr.`item_no` WHERE itbr.`item_bom_no` = ( SELECT DISTINCT it.bom_no FROM ly_shoporder so,ly_item it WHERE so.shoporder_item = it.item_no AND so.shoporder_no = #{shoporderNo} AND so.`site` = #{site}) AND itbr.`site` = #{site} GROUP BY itbr.`item_no`
mapper.sql: id, pod_button_no, pod_button_name, pod_function, pod_icon, site, by_user, create_time
mapper.select:
select
from ly_pod_button where ly_pod_button.id in (SELECT pod_button_no FROM ly_operation_pod WHERE operation_no=#{operation_no})

SELECT rs.*, ls.* FROM `ly_route_step` rs LEFT JOIN ly_shoporder ls ON ls.`process_route` = rs.`process_route` WHERE rs.`operation` NOT IN ( SELECT rss.`next_operation` FROM ly_route_step rss ) AND ls.`shoporder_no` = #{shoporder} AND ls.`site` = #{site}

select m.sfc, m.operation, m.nc_code, m.by_user, m.create_time, m.nc_code_group, nc.nc_code_desc, ncg.nc_code_group_desc, ss.shoporderId, ls.shoporder_item, li.item_name, li.item_desc from (select sn.sfc, sn.operation, sn.nc_code, sn.by_user, sn.create_time, ncr.nc_code_group from ly_sfc_nc sn left join ly_nc_code_relation ncr on sn.nc_code = ncr.nc_code where sn.site = #{site} AND sn.status = '0' and ncr.site = #{site} and sn.sfc= #{sfc} )m left join ly_nc_code nc on m.nc_code = nc.nc_code left join ly_nc_code_group ncg on m.nc_code_group = ncg.nc_code_group_no left join ly_shoporder_sfc ss on m.sfc = ss.sfc left join ly_shoporder ls on ss.shoporderId = ls.shoporder_no left join ly_item li on ls.shoporder_item = li.item_no where nc.site = #{site} and ncg.site = #{site} and ss.site = #{site} and ls.site = #{site} and li.site = #{site}

select sn.sfc, sn.operation, sn.nc_code, ncr.nc_code_group, st.workcenter workcenter_child, st.shoporder, wr.workcenter from ly_sfc_nc sn left join ly_nc_code_relation ncr on sn.nc_code = ncr.nc_code left join ly_sfc_step st on sn.sfc = st.sfc and sn.operation = st.operation left join ly_workcenter_relation wr on wr.workcenter_child = st.workcenter where sn.site = #{site} and sn.sfc=#{sfc} and ncr.site = #{site} and st.site =#{site} and wr.site = #{site}

select id from ly_pod_button where site = '*'
AND pod_button_name = #{pod_button_name}
